title: bind
description: A function from an imported library.

proc.description: The main process executing code that bound the listening port.

host.description: The host running the process that bound the listening port. Typically the same host referenced in :proc, if present.

exe.description: The specific file containing code that bound the listening port. May or may not be the same :exe specified in :proc, if present.

time.description: The time the port was bound.

server.description: The inet:addr of the server when binding the port.

server:ipv4.description: The IPv4 address specified to bind().

server:ipv6.description: The IPv6 address specified to bind().
